original_text: The priests join together like robbers. They hide themselves and they are ready to attack. They wait on the road to Shechem, ready to murder people who pass that way. 6: Shechem was an important city. They have done wicked things. The priests join together like robbers.
korean_text: 강도 떼가 사람을 기다림 같이 제사장의 무리가 세겜 길에서 살인하니 그들이 사악을 행하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The priests join together like robbers.
and they are ready to attack.
They wait on the road to Shechem,
ready to murder people who pass that way.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 길을 지나가는 사람들을 죽일 준비가 되어 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: The priests join together like robbers.
